entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: SSE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain mixed with snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy and blowing snow this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
